sentences.sContent: He felt a deep sense of shame.
(= it made her feel ashamed ) , she gained back all the weight she’d lost.
sentences.sCn: 让她感到惭愧的是，她减掉的体重全又长回来了。

sentences.sContent: He’s brought shame on the whole family.
(= it should not make you feel ashamed ) saying ‘I don’t know’.
sentences.sCn: 说一句"我不知道”也没什么可难为情的。

synos.tran: 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人

words.tran: 可耻的；不体面的；不道德的；猥亵的
无耻的；不要脸的；伤风败俗的
不知羞耻地；厚着脸皮地

trans.tranCn: 羞耻，羞愧，耻辱；可耻的人
trans.tranOther: the feeling you have when you feel guilty and embarrassed because you, or someone who is close to you, have done something wrong
